name: WASM Cities
description:
WASM Cities

This is a  Tile Cities clone for the second WASM-4 game jam written in Zig.

In this game you need to provide city blocks with their water and greenery demands. You get a point for each new tile. Closing holes will reward you with 10 points and connecting the canals earns you 5 points. There is a timed mode where you have only 3 seconds to place each tile.
